title: Survival: Tribe/Community
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Edition, Stamp and Chop
 LRC,  in pencil: [Jaune Q T S Smith]
description: purple image in background center of a building plan and various text; \"TRIBE\" and \"COMMUNITY\" at top and bottom in purple; sketches of rabbits\' heads at right and left in purple; small images of hands, buffalo, paws, figures, fish and bags in purple at bottom; horses\' heads, Native American on horse and figures with guns and bows at top edge in purple; large yellow and red rabbit at center, standing on hind legs with front paws on hips
creditline: The Patricia and Peter Frechette Endowment Fund and the James and Maureen Duffey Endowment for Prints and Drawings
